page.title: 08IRVINE * PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content:
{ {Public transport}is provided by 3 companies, Western S.M.T., A.A. Buses, and A.1 Bus Company.
The{A.1 company}was started in the 1920's by the miners of the local villages to travel to Ardrossan from Kilmarnock. The A.1 company get on very well with the other companies who also operate in the area. The company have been seriously affected by the growth in the number of private cars and have been forced to slim their fleet of vehicles, and consequently their staff has been reduced.The whole company still employs about 130 people. To replace each bus with a new one, which is necessary from time to time, costs the company between Â£70000 and Â£100000 for each vehicle.
